title: Comparison: RICHEST People in the World 2022

media:group.media:title: Comparison: RICHEST People in the World 2022
media:group.media:description:
This data visualization video is an updated version of the the top billionaires video from 2020. These are the richest people in the world and comes from Forbes' yearly billionaire list. Some of the individuals are somewhat controversial, as their wealth comes from the state, corruption or wage theft. 

I also included a line graph to show the performance over time. Lines stop when there's no more data on the particular individual. 
Comparison: RICHEST Countries in the World 2022
#Comparison #Richest #Billionaires
